q: Mr Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Mr Page and Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google's executive chairman. The changes come into effect on April 4. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Mr Eric Schmidt said. Mr Page praised Mr Eric Schmidt , too. When people criticize Larry as the new CEO, that's grossly unfair to Larry, Eric Schmidt told reporters, according to the Journal. "He has been with me at every business decision for 10 years."
